titles.title: An original resolution authorizing expenditures by the Committee on Armed Services.

action.text: Committee on Armed Services. Original measure reported to Senate by Senator Warner. Without written report.
Referred to the Committee on Rules and Administration.

calendar.text: Committee on Armed Services ordered to be reported an original measure.

bill.summary: 2/1/2005--Reported to Senate without amendment. Authorizes expenditures by the Committee on Armed Services for the 109th Congress.
